game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Ancient legends speak of a lost treasure hidden deep within a secret cave. Your mission is to locate and retrieve the treasure.

task.description: Speak to the old cartographer in the town to obtain a map leading to the cave.
Find the hidden key in the graveyard and use it to open the ancient door guarding the cave.
Explore the treacherous cave system and solve puzzles to reach the chamber containing the treasure.
Locate the treasure chest and claim the valuable artifact inside.
Find your way back to the quest-giver and present him with the artifact.
